ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.fragments

Class ExpenseItemListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.fragments.ExpenseItemListFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView<ExpenseClaim>

    public class ExpenseItemListFragment
extends Fragment
implements IView<ExpenseClaim>
    Displays list of all the expenseItems a claim has. Second tab of the claim summary Core functionality generated by Eclipse when creating TabbedView
